inputDigit=digit=>{if(waitingForOperand){setDisplay(String(digit));setWaitingForOperand(false);}else{setDisplay(display==='0'?String(digit):display+digit);}};const firstValue/secondValue;case'%':return firstValue%secondValue;default:return secondValue;}};const performCalculation=()=>{if(!previousValue||!operation)return;const inputValue=parseFloat(display);const
